classification_data.text: COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA CERTIFICACIÓN DEL CONTADOR PÚBLICO El suscrito Contador Público de LA EMPRESA ROMEGAS SAS., identificada con NIT 900.127.447 - 1, hace constar que, de acuerdo con el libro oficial de registro de accionistas, inscrito en el registro mercantil, CERTIFICA QUE: La composición accionaria es la siguiente: Se expide a los veinticinco (31) días del mes de mayo de 2023 Cordialmente, LAURA I. OVIEDO GOMEZ TP 304428 – T CONTADORA PÚBLICA DOCUMENTO ACCIONISTAS % PARTICIPACION ACCIONES SUSCRITAS VALOR NOMINAL CC. 79.735.871 JULIO CESAR ROMERO MUÑOZ 100% 2.000 $10.000 TOTAL 100% 2.000 $10.000

content.thinking: Let's analyze the document systematically following the classification workflow: 1. TEXT EXTRACTION: The document appears to be a certificate of shareholder composition ("COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA") for a company called ROMEGAS SAS with NIT 900.127.447-1. The document is signed by a public accountant (LAURA I. OVIEDO GOMEZ) and shows that the company has a single shareholder named JULIO CESAR ROMERO MUÑOZ who owns 100% of the shares (2,000 shares with a nominal value of $10,000 each). 2. PRIORITY CHECKS: - Not BLANK: The document clearly contains meaningful content. - Not LINK_ONLY: The document does not primarily consist of hyperlinks. 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION: - Not a DIAN document: No DIAN logo or header is visible. - Not issued by Chamber of Commerce: No mention of "Cámara de Comercio". - Appears to be issued by the company itself, certified by its public accountant. 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS: The document's function is to certify the ownership structure of the company ROMEGAS SAS, showing that it has a single shareholder who owns 100% of the shares. This is clearly about corporate ownership structure, not individual identification, tax compliance, or legal existence. 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION: Given the clear focus on shareholder composition with specific ownership percentages (100%), number of shares (2,000), and nominal value ($10,000), this document best fits the ACC (Accionistas) category. Must-have indicators present for ACC: - Shareholder terminology: "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" (Shareholder Composition) - Ownership data: "100%" ownership percentage - Number of shares: "2,000" shares - Capital contribution value: "$10,000" nominal value - Owner identification: "JULIO CESAR ROMERO MUÑOZ" with ID number - Certification by an accountant: "LAURA I. OVIEDO GOMEZ, CONTADORA PÚBLICA" 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION: The document shows strong evidence for the ACC category, containing all the must-have indicators for a shareholder composition certificate including ownership percentages, shares, and shareholder identification. The document is clearly titled "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" which directly aligns with the ACC category. Therefore, the classification is ACC (Accionistas).
